item.title: Raichur Microfinance Scam: Four Arrested for Extorting Farmers
item.description: <![CDATA[RAICHUR: The Raichur Rural Police apprehended four persons on Saturday for allegedly extorting money from farmers under the guise of microfinance recovery. The suspects are identified as Fayyaz , Sheikh MD Ayub , Syed Shahbaz Ahmed , and Haroon Rashid.Sheikh MD Ayub, who works as a recovery officer at Bajaj Finance, teamed up with three associates to identify individuals with unpaid loans using a mobile application. The group allegedly threatened borrowers by blocking their vehicles on the road ...]]>

item.title: 3,000 women begin dharna on education, malnutrition issues in Karnataka's Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[3,000 women begin dharna on education, malnutrition issues in Karnataka's Raichur
They argued that the government has failed to meet the fundamental rights of the people despite several protests against lack of response to redress several problems....]]>
